mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_reply (product_id, user_id, content, rating) VALUES (#{productId}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{rating});
mapper.select: SELECT reply_id AS replyId, product_id AS productId, user_id AS userId, created_at AS createdAt, content, rating FROM product_reply WHERE product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY created_at DESC limit #{skip}, #{amount}
SELECT count(*) FROM product_reply WHERE product_id = #{productId}
